title: Rewrite the Function in Standard Form
text: Express the function in the general form of a cosecant function: $$h(x)=Acsc(Bx-C)$$.

title: Find the Period
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=Acsc(Bx-C)$$, the period is $$\frac{2\pi}{|B|}$$. So T $$=$$ $$\frac{2\pi}{\frac{\pi}{3}}$$ $$=$$ $$6$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=Atan(Bx-C)$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=\frac{-\pi}{\frac{\pi}{3}}=-3$$
